title: Mac Client: Patch 6.19 In game network Issue (Central)
body:
Hello! I play league on a 13' Macbook air and the mac client (not perfect) has more or less treated me well
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

As of patch 6.19 a new network issues has been giving me grief and after many attempts of trying to fix it I have concluded that it may be a client/game issue.

**Problem:** The client runs fine, and usually for the first 3-6 minutes of the game my ping is at a consistent 33ms. However around the 7-10 min mark my ping rises to around 250-400 and remains this way for the rest of the game. Thus earning me several Low priority Qs across several of my accounts.

**Reasoning:** When i first came across this issue i paid very close attention to my ping and internet speeds via "internetspeedtest by ookla" as well as the google one. Before loading into the game, during champ select my internet speed is around 15-25mbs depending the hour of the day. The moment I load into Summoners Rift the internet speed drops to 0.04 to n/a mbs.

At first i thought this may have been a peak hour internet usage issue via my ISP. However i have tried playing in the morning 8am, afternoon 2pm and late night 1-2am and the issue kept reoccurring.

**What i have Done:** Updated my os, Troubleshooted my Router, repaired client, re-installed client

nothing so far has worked and not being able to play is making me feel sad.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 

Worth nothing: Custom games where i was bymyslef also had ping at around 400ms

Is there anything I can do to attack this problem?

Appreciate the help!

replies.body: The sudden lag spikes could certainly be due to a connection issue, and would result in input delays while in-game.  Macs don't usually tend to have a lot of issues, and most commonly are related to network problems.  Luckily, we have a solid [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot and fix this up.  Give it a go!

I tried all the methods that your trouble shooting guide has to offer as well as the hextex repair tool

however no matter what time of the day, the game causes my internet to drop to .02mbs and this massive drop always occurs after the first 3 minutes of in game time. The ping rises to at most 600 than fluctuates between 200-400.

Is there any other fix i can try?

We'd like to help and find out what's going on!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can dig into this specific issue.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!
Thanks ill give it a shot and get back to you
